strapiPost.title: New Low-Cost Flight To Outback Bowl
strapiPost.content:
Breeze Airways has added a flight to get Razorback fans to the Outback Bowl in Tampa, Florida. 

  • For the fans: When the game against Penn State was announced earlier this week, the surge of fans buying plane tickets to see the Hogs led to limited availability and hiked prices. Breeze added a flight from XNA that will get fans out and back for the big bowl game.
  • Victories: This season for the Razorbacks has been “one of the most remarkable” years in recent history and it’s a big thanks to Coach Sam Pittman, who was awarded Region 2 Coach of the Year earlier this week.

After you book your flights, you can read more about the legendary season HERE.
